mapper.insert: insert into employee(name,sex,no,age,description,department_id) values(#{name},#{sex},#{no},#{age},#{description},#{departmentId}) // 绑值时要用驼峰的写法
mapper.update: update employee set name = #{name}, sex = #{sex}, no = #{no}, age = #{age}, description = #{description}, department_id = #{departmentId} where id = #{id}
mapper.select:
select * from employee
and name like '%${name}%' // 全模糊查询
